title: How to Get the Fastest Boost from the Exotic's Performance in NFS Carbon

steps.headline: Buy/get the fastest exotic you can.
Customize it with Level 3 Performance (best suited)
Put some Autosculpt to make your car look cool.
If optional when you start the game, do a cheat code for nitrous, and it will never end!
Put some visuals on if you need to.
Adjust the ride height.
steps.description: (If optional, adjust it to a 100%, the best ride height)

steps.headline: Don't forget the wheel paint (If you want to).
Save your car (Career or Quick Race, which ever is suited).
Test-drive your exotic car - Best to experiment in Quick Race

text: Buy/get the fastest exotic you can.  Customize it with Level 3 Performance (best suited)  Put some Autosculpt to make your car look cool.  If optional when you start the game, do a cheat code for nitrous, and it will never end!  Put some visuals on if you need to.  Adjust the ride height. (If optional, adjust it to a 100%, the best ride height) Don't forget the wheel paint (If you want to).  Save your car (Career or Quick Race, which ever is suited).  Test-drive your exotic car - Best to experiment in Quick Race
